description: A scuba diver swims towards a dark cave entrance where ominous eyes glow from within. Piled neatly on the seabed are discarded scuba tanks, mask, fins, and a speargun stuck into the gear. The contrast between the approaching, seemingly unaware diver and the fate hinted at by the abandoned, damaged equipment creates dark irony. The presence of a creature collecting or discarding diving gear adds a touch of the absurd to the underwater environment.
